title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project goals, scope, timeline, resources, and milestones.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Collect and analyze requirements for satellite imagery analysis, including data sources, analysis techniques, and desired outputs.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. The architecture should consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. It should also address data storage, processing, and analysis requirements for handling large volumes of satellite imagery data. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards for handling sensitive data related to military activities and installations.

title: Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Develop components for ingesting and preprocessing satellite imagery data.

title: Machine Learning Model Development
description: Develop and train machine learning models for detecting and tracking military activities and installations.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for visualizing and interacting with the analysis results.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement data storage and management solutions for satellite imagery and analysis results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms for sensitive data and analysis results.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the SatelliteImageryAnalyzer software to production environments and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and provide training for users and administrators.
